title: Skin viewer on client?
body:
Hey I've wanted this for a long time and was wondering if riot could put this into the game if I had enough support. 

I have over 100 champions and half of them have skins but im not able to look at them unless I physically click each champ one at a time and look theough the skins so I thought it would be a good idea for riot to put a skin viewer in the client? Could let you choose between showing purchased and not purchased skins. 

My $0.02 anyway

replies.body:
I agree this would be good.

How about implement a feature in the shop.
Right after "Not Owned", add an "Owned" option :D. 
Then you can scroll through on the shop.
